naslov: Okrug Gornji, ZGRADA SA 6 2s APARTMANA / BAZEN  - video / ČITAJ OPIS (prodaja)
opis: - ekskluzivna prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% + pdv od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. NAPOMENA: ozbiljnim klijentima na upit šaljemo detaljni video eksterijera i interijera, te detaljne slike objekta. Ako tražite savršenu nekretninu za ulaganje u turističku djelatnost, ne propustite ovu priliku! Prodajemo prekrasnu zgradu novije gradnje (2011.godina), smještenu na mirnoj lokaciji u Okrugu gornjem, samo 300 metara od mora i plaže. Zgrada ima panoramski pogled na more i otok Čiovo, koji će vas oduševiti svojom ljepotom i raznolikošću. Zgrada se sastoji od 6 prostranih i moderno uređenih dvosobnih apartmana, svaki sa svojim balkonom ili terasom s pogledom na more. Apartmani su kompletno opremljeni klima uređajima, TV-om, internetom, kuhinjom i kupaonicom, namještajem... Zgrada ima i zajednički bazen s ležaljkama i suncobranima, gdje se možete opustiti i uživati u sunčanim danima. Zgrada ima i parking za goste i vlasnike. - vlasništvo uredno (vlasništvo tvrtke) Ne propustite ovu jedinstvenu priliku da postanete vlasnik ove moderne zgrade, koja će vam donijeti zadovoljstvo i profit! exclusive sale of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% + VAT from the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. NOTE: to serious clients, upon request, we send a detailed video of the exterior and interior, as well as detailed pictures of the object. If you are looking for the perfect property to invest in tourism, don't miss this opportunity! We are selling a beautiful building of recent construction (year 2011), located in a quiet location in Okrug Gornji, only 300 meters from the sea and the beach. The building has a panoramic view of the sea and the island of Čiovo, which will delight you with its beauty and diversity. The building consists of 6 spacious and modern two-room apartments, each with its own balcony or terrace with a view of the sea. The apartments are fully equipped with air conditioning, TV, internet, kitchen and bathroom, furniture... The building also has a shared swimming pool with sunbeds and umbrellas, where you can relax and enjoy sunny days. The building has parking for guests and owners. - proper ownership (company ownership) Do not miss this unique opportunity to become the owner of this modern building, which will bring you pleasure and profit!
